attributes.action: investigate and intevene in the apparent inflexible and agressive attitude of Northern Rock regarding reposessions and ask that instruction be given to the Managers there to be sympathetic to Mortgage Holders in difficulties and not push for Repossesions in a haste to reimburse our "the Taxpayers'" funding.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Relates to an article on BBC television 17th October regarding a particular borrower 'Esther' who appeared on the information given to have been treated unfairly and unsympathetically
